name: Alchemist's Golem
description:
This is the first release version of Alchemist's Golem.  This is an agriculture management game with a more magical basis.  

Currently you can grow and manage crops, each which require different levels of magical energy in the soil (and water).  They can be restored using items.   These items and seeds can be brought and sold at the vending machine.  

Controls: 

  • WASD - movement
  • Left click - use items on soil
  • Tab - inventory
  • E - interactions
  • Shift - sprint
  • Escape - pause menu

Planned Content: 

  • Seasons
  • Plot Upgrades
  • Market Sell Fluctuations
  • Quest Board
    • Main Quests
    • Sub Quests
  • Events
  • Wild plant life to harvest
  • More islands to explore with different environments
  • More crop types
